resources.string:
This app allows you to use your hardware HOME button with integrated fingerprint sensor on Samsung Galaxy devices (Android 7.0+) as a capacitive HOME button. You can use Quick Settings Tile to toggle the service on/off if needed, use it to temporary disable the service if you need to use fingerprint authentication in any app.

Before adding quick settings tile to the notification bar, please open the app and run the service first.

Service runs in foreground and monitors touches on the fingerprint sensor. When touch is detected, it works like pressing the HOME button physically. Service is paused when screen is off and has no battery impact. This app uses Samsung fingerprint SDK.
